title: Income rises, effect on SR and LR price, output

content.question: Assume that a competitive industry producing a normal good is in long-run equilibrium. If average consumer income decreases, which of the following changes will occur?

choices.label: Short-Run Price Short-Run Industry Output Movement Firms Increase Increase Enter
Short-Run Price Short-Run Industry Output Movement Firms Increase Decrease Exit
Short-Run Price Short-Run Industry Output Movement Firms Decrease Increase Exit
Short-Run Price Short-Run Industry Output Movement Firms Decrease Decrease Enter
Short-Run Price Short-Run Industry Output Movement Firms Decrease Decrease Exit

content.answer: Short-Run Price Short-Run Industry Output Movement Firms Decrease Decrease Exit

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
